Name: Main Gate (Dr. AIT)
Description: Main entrance to the campus on Outer Ring Road

Name: Main Academic Building(A Block)
Description: Main administrative building housing principal office, accounts, and admission department. Located at campus center.

Name: AIT Library
Description: Central library with 72,983 volumes, digital library with DELNET access, and reading halls

Name: Silver Jubilee Building (SJB)
Description: Major block housing departments like Civil, Mechanical & Aeronautical

Name: Boys Hostel
Description: Boys hostel with accommodation for 900 students. Includes mess and recreation facilities.

Name: Girls Hostel
Description: Girls hostel with accommodation for 600 students with 24/7 security

Name: College Canteen/Cafeteria
Description: Central cafeteria serving vegetarian food and snacks to students and faculty

Name: Rock Garden
Description: Landscaped area on campus for students

Name: Sports Ground (Cricket/Football)
Description: Main outdoor playing field

Name: Bank/ATM Point
Description: Location of the bank and ATM service on campus

Name: Med. Electronics/Clubs/(B Block)
Description: Academic Block B (Houses Medical Electronics and other depts.)

Name: CSE/ECE/EEE(C Block)
Description: Academic Block C (Houses CSE, ECE and EEE)

Name: ISE/Humanities/MCA/MBA/EI(D Block)
Description: Academic Block D (Houses ISE, MCA, MBA, EI & Humanities)

Name: JPN Auditorium
Description: Main auditorium for events, seminars, cultural activities and placement drives

Name: Research & Development Center
Description: Research center with TEQIP funding for advanced research and development projects

Name: Data and Computer Center
Description: Centralized IT and Data Center Facilities

Name: Indoor Sports Complex
Description: Indoor sports complex with gymnasium

Name: Dr. AIT Stationery Shop
Description: Campus society/store for books and essentials

Name: MTR (Food Area)
Description: Possible specific food joint/mess inside campus

Name: AIT Amphitheatre
Description: Open area for events

Name: Dr. BR Ambedkar Statue
Description: The statue is a tribute as well as serves as a landmark where faculty, students & guests pay there respect during events or campus programs

Name: Dr. AIT Student Parking
Description: Parking lot for motorcycles

Name: Gate II (Dr. AIT)
Description: Second entrance to the campus on Outer Ring Road
